message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid $12000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $14000?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $16500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable going above $14000. Would you be willing to meet me at $14000?

I've already made a significant concession, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $16500. I'm afraid that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
